doc.title: Stag: Clothing Optional Uncensored
doc.plot: It doesn't take long to realize who wears the pants in this relationship. Living in constant fear of his fianc√©e Crystal, Ross was allowed to remove his shackles for his bachelor party. But he soon realized that his actions would put him right back in Crystal's penitentiary. Plus, we are living large with the Pimp of all P.I.M.P's. Before he gets hitched, Artavious shows us how to get crunk, drunk, and crazy! STAG: Clothing Optional Uncensored. You're not going to want to miss this party! Only on Events IN DEMAND Pay-per-View.
